Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, <MYNAME>. You kept me
waiting.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know today is Spring Harmony Day? I
made something to pay you back for
Winter Harmony Day. Want to eat with me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right then, let's go to the table.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
How is it, <MYNAME>? It's perfect, right?
I learned how to make it from Clement
himself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm? You say it's rare that I'm taking
lessons from anyone?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I didn't really have a choice since
it's for you. Even I will humbly accept
anyone's help if it will make you happy.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yeah. I had Clement eat some of my
stuff when I was practicing making these
sweets...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>He was so impressed with me that he said
I could work as a pastry chef right
away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Isn't that great, <MYNAME>? You now have
your own personal pastry chef. I could
make you something everyday if you want.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're really scarfing them down,
<MYNAME>. You like the sweets that much?
Or are you just tired from work?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I love seeing you while you're working,
but make sure you don't over do it.
<PAGE>
No one is more important to me than you.
Don't you go and make me worry now.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After you finish eating this, I'll apply
a luxury hair mask for you and also give
you a head massage.
<PAGE>
Today is special, so it's another little
gift for you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You want me to whisper some words of
love while I'm at it? Ha, just kidding!

That was really such a great gift. I
better get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, <MYNAME>. I was waiting for
you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know today is Spring Harmony Day? I
made you something as thanks for what
you gave me last winter! Let's dig in!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay, great! I'll get it ready, so just
sit in that chair and wait.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I made these sweets myself. I'm so glad
you like them!
<PAGE>
You really do look happy. I'd make
sweets for you every day if always got
to see that cute smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Thank you for everything, <MYNAME>. I'll
always love you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
To tell you the truth, I made a card to
give you with the sweets...
<PAGE>
It became a love letter with nothing but
hokey lines, so I threw it out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What? You wanted that love letter?
O-Oh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, I'll try again next year. Don't
laugh even if it turns out a little
strange.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy we can keep going on dates 
like this even after getting married.
I've always wanted something like this.
<PAGE>
I never thought I'd be able to find my
ideal wife and live my ideal married
life.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I hope we'll be
together forever.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You know these sweets? I took a lot of
care in making them to show how
much I appreciate you.
<PAGE>
I thought about everything you've done
for me and how much it's made me happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It made realize just how much you
love me. Thanks so much, <MYNAME>.

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome back! You must be
tired from a long day's work.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know today is Spring Harmony Day? I
made you something, and I was thinking
we could eat it together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha. I'm really glad you like it. Well,
let's dig in.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yeah, so these sweets? I made them
with Charles. He was planning to give
his to Camellia and Hina.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Anyway, so we were two middle-aged guys
making sweets together. We went through
trial and error with cookbook in hand.
<PAGE>
If you saw us then, we must have looked
really stupid. Just thinking about it
makes me feel depressed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I'm glad to see you so happy,
<MYNAME>. I think I'll try to whip
something up again next year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the way, I still haven't thanked you
yet, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You know how shy I am. I can't say it
unless it's a special occasion like
Harmony Day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, here it goes. Thank you for
everything, <MYNAME>. I'm so glad I
married you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once I was helped out on a report on how
men with girlfriends or a wife and kids
celebrate Harmony Day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I was young back then, and the whole
time I was working I thought about how I
wanted cover more interesting material.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But now I think those kind of reports
would be interesting to work on.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Humans sure are amazing. Simply having
someone you love can make you
completely change the way you think.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even though we're married, doing this is
still a bit embarrassing. I'm getting
all nervous now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, you must have felt the same way
during Winter Harmony Day?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, <MYNAME>, do you feel as happy as I
did during Winter Harmony Day?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, looking at your happy face gives
it away. Thank you for everything,
<MYNAME>.

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome back, <MYNAME>. You must be tired
from a long day's work.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is Spring Harmony Day, so I made
some sweets. Would you like to eat them
together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for agreeing. Now allow to
take care of some final preparations.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dessert uses a sweetener from my
home country. It's very rare around
here.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I had it sent here so that you
can enjoy the tastes of my home country.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh? You like it very much? That is a
relief. It was certainly worth the
effort it took to get a hold of it.
<PAGE>
I hope you can come with me to my home
town one of these days.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I made these sweets yesterday, but since
we're living together, I had a hard time
keeping it a secret.
<PAGE>
I had intended to present them to you at
home, so I had change the place I was
hiding them constantly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>There were a few times you almost found
them and that made me quite nervous...
But it was also somewhat exciting too.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, <MYNAME>. Thank you very much for
everything.
<PAGE>
I always make an effort to tell you how
much I appreciate you, but just that
isn't enough for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's why I put all my feelings of
appreciation I couldn't properly convey
to you into these sweets.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So I hope you'll enjoy them a little
slower than usual. I would love it if
you did that for me.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Phew...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, please excuse me. I am a little
short on sleep after working so hard to 
prepare for Harmony Day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Actually, for the past several days I
had been waiting for you to fall asleep
and then getting to work.
<PAGE>
I hope you won't be too hard on me if I
oversleep tomorrow.

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you're home. Were you working
now until?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know today is Spring Harmony Day? I
made you something. Wanna eat it with
me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... Okay, let's get to it then.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Well... Thanks for
everything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You know me. I mean, I know I'm causing
you a lot of trouble...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But that's why I'm so thankful that
you're always by my side.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm glad we got married. Thanks.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. How do the sweets taste?
Pretty good, I bet?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh. I'm glad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What? You got a problem with me making
sweets by hand for Harmony Day?
<PAGE>
I know it's not like me, but doing
something like this now and again isn't
bad, right? Come on. Hurry up and eat.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Sorry. I don't really like sweet foods.
The smell is just too strong for me.
<PAGE>
Don't mind me and just eat them. I
wanted to watch you eat anyway, so
I'll be fine.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Ah, never mind. Just hurry up and eat.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that I think about it, occasions
like this aren't all that bad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I was never any good with people. I
hated spending time with anyone.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But when I started dating you and then
we got married, we started sharing more
things. That actually made me happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You've given me so much happiness just
by being beside me. Thanks...

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome back. Are you finished
for the day?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today is Spring Harmony Day, so I
prepared a gift to thank you for Winter
Harmony Day. Let's eat it together.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. Now let's sit at the
table.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Harmony Day is a very nice festivity. My
home country has a similar practice, but
I never got to experience it myself.
<PAGE>
I'm able to experience so many events
all thanks to you reviving the town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>As your husband and a resident of the
town, I would like to thank you from
the bottom of my heart, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for everything, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
By marrying you, I realize just how
important it is to have a family.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I never thought my heart would be so at
ease just by living with the one I love.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope these lovely days will continue
into the future. Let's work together to
keep things as nice as they are now.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, I'm sorry. I was thinking about how
I can fully express my thanks to you.
<PAGE>
I want to make you happy, not just with
sweets, but with words too. Yet I can't
think of the right thing to say.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But I'll tell you at least this: <MYNAME>,
I love you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you look happy. Did it taste
that good?
<PAGE>
It's all thanks to me? Oh, I'm glad to
hear that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It is a wonderful thing that I can make
someone happy through my own efforts
and not just because I am a prince.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Deep down I really feel that you have
given me something to live for. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Welcome home!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is Harmony Day so I prepared some
special sweets! Hey, do you want to
eat them together?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'll get them ready real
quick!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks for everything, <MYNAME>. You must
be tired from a long day's
work!
<PAGE>
As the backbone of the family, you
really do work hard, <MYNAME>. That's why
I'll do my best to support you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you're feeling tired, I will always
be around to give you a hug. That's what
I'm here for!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm, these sweets might be a bit too
sweet. I think I used a little too much
sugar.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That's strange. Maybe I had to taste
test so many times that my sense of
taste went haywire.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What? You think it's okay? You're too
kind, <MYNAME>. That's why I like you
oh so much!
<PAGE>
I'm so glad to have such a wonderful man
for a husband. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've noticed this for a while now, but
you eat like some kind of small animal,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I mean, look. You're stuffing your
cheeks full of the sweets and have some
all around your mouth. It's so cute!<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, I'm sorry. You look really handsome
usually. So what if you look like that
once in a while?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But don't show your cute side to anyone
but me, okay? It's something only I get
to enjoy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's wonderful for a husband and wife
to exchange sweets on Harmony Days. I've
dreamed of a married life like this!
<PAGE>
Say, <MYNAME>. Thank you for always being
with me.
<PAGE>
I hope we'll continue to eat sweets
together like this even after we we're
old and gray!

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Welcome home!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh that's right, did ya know that today
is Winter Harmony Day? I have some
sweets for you, so let's eat together.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Can you go and get the sweets from the
kitchen? I'll be waiting at the table.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, this turned out well if I do say
so myself.<RED>∀</RED> I'm both cute and good
at cooking. Aren't I the perfect wife?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I know today is Winter Harmony Day, but
actually you should be the one feeling
grateful since I decided to marry you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What do you mean, "yeah"? Wh-What
are you saying. You're so dense when
it comes to jokes...
<PAGE>
Okay, fine. I'll just be straightforward
with you today. Thank you for
everything, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. Are my handmade sweets
good?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Haha, then you know what to do. You can
thank me by giving me a massage. Making
sweets has got my shoulders stiff.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so glad you're
so understanding!<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I'll give you a massage too, <MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED>
... When I feel like it that is!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
It's hard being so popular. I'm tired
from passing out gifts in return for
what I got on Spring Harmony Day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Don't worry. I only gave everyone
postcards.
<PAGE>
There's no way I'm going through the
trouble of making sweets for everyone.
Just your batch was enough already!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <MYNAME>. Thank you for always doing
so much for me.
<PAGE>
It's thanks to you always being so
caring that I'm able to live a
comfortable life.<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I hope you'll continue to take care of
me! Hey, I'll even make sweets for you
every Harmony Day!<RED>∀</RED>

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... Welcome home...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Winter Harmony Day... I made you a
gift... Want to eat it?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good... Want to go to the table?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um... Are the sweets good?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Good... I tried really hard, so I'm glad
you like them.
<PAGE>
I made it out of appreciation for you...
So please eat a lot.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so happy every single day... I'm so
glad I married you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>... I love you.
<PAGE>
Always stay by my side... please.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, what is it? You look happy...
<PAGE>
Hmm? You're happy about the sweets I
made for you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Th-Thank you... I'll make something even
tastier next year... Really, I'll try my
best!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um... There's something I want to say
to you... Hear me out...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was so happy on Winter Harmony Day...
<PAGE>
I'll try hard to be worthy of
appreciation next year too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If I do a good job... Can you give me
sweets again? It's a promise, okay?

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. You must be tired
from a long day's work.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know today is Winter Harmony Day?
I prepared a gift for you, so how about
we eat it together, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you. Now let's go to the table.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you work very hard every day, so
this is a little something to thank you
for it. Please eat up.
<PAGE>
Oh, I'll do some maintenance work on
your tools later, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Is there anything else you want? It
doesn't have to be today, so if you
think of something, just ask me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, it's only natural for me to
support you as your wife. I pride in it,
actually.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um, <MYNAME>. Did you give anyone besides
me some sweets for Harmony Day?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, don't worry. I won't get grumpy
just because you gave some to other
people.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Now if it was back when we were still
dating, I wouldn't have been too
happy...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I really know I'm loved as your wife
because of how you treat me, <MYNAME>. I'm
very grateful for that.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Um, <MYNAME>. Can you sense the feelings
I've put into these sweets?
<PAGE>
Oh? You want to know what kind of
feelings I put in?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>It's a bit embarrassing to say it out
loud here.
<PAGE>
I'm sure you'll know after you finish
eating. Please let me know what you
think then.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, please let me express my
gratitude again. Thank you!
<PAGE>
How we support each other as husband
and wife might be considered normal, but
I think it's worth showing thanks for.
<PAGE>
I want us to create a relationship where
we will never forget to express our
thanks for each other, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
So, please... Let's eat sweets together
next year for Harmony Day too.

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, <MYNAME>. Today is Harmony
Day!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I prepared some sweets for you to thank
you for everything! You want to eat them
together?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, come on over to the table.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Actually, after Clement taught me how to
make these sweets I whipped them up
myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>To be honest, I think store bought ones
taste better than what I made...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But the love for you I put into these is
is unbeatable, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, thank you for everything. I love
you!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These sweets may look plain, but they're
actually filled with lots of nutritious
ingredients!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>What? You want to know what I put in
them? Well...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It's a secret! Try to imagine what's
inside while you eat them.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Feelings of gratitude are invisible, so
it's very difficult to transfer them
into something tangible.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, my feelings for you can only be
expressed by an even grander kind of
sweets...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But since I couldn't fully express my
thanks, I'll do the rest by showing it
to you with words and actions!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, I'm sorry. I was just thinking about
how we'll be eating together just like
this again next year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I wished for something like this when we
were still dating, so I'm very happy
now...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope we'll always be like this,
<MYNAME>.

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Welcome back.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must know today is Harmony Day,
right? I got you some sweets, so let's
eat them together, okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good answer! Now let's go over to the
table.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, <MYNAME>. Do you feel any different
after eating those sweets?
<PAGE>
So yeah, anyone who eats them and
doesn't love me and will have their
entire body turn a dark purplish color.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I guess this proves that you really do
love me, <MYNAME>. Great!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm, maybe sweets aren't enough.
<PAGE>
Since it's called Harmony Day, I want
to do something much flashier. What
do you think?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'll cast an explosive magic spell that
I just crafted earlier and...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Hey, don't get so freaked out. Oh, geez.
You haven't changed since the day we
met, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But I kind of like that. I hope just
stay your same unchanging self, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, you're making a weird face while
you're eating. What's wrong, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Huh? You want to know how I made these
sweets? With magic of course!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, I get it. You wanted to eat one that
I made by hand? Too bad for you!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, if you let me test my magic out
on you every day, I'll think about
giving you handmade sweets!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it? You look happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh, you're thanking me for the awesome
sweets? Aw, well aren't you adorable!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>
Well, I do appreciate you. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.<RED>∀</RED>

That was such a great gift. I better
get back to working hard starting
tomorrow.
